extension.description: This plugin allows you to manage and release k2 items for your subscribers in the schedule you want

field.name: number_new_k2_items_each_time
field.label: Number New K2 Items Each Time
field.description: Number new k2 items you can setup each time

field.name: release_item_older_than_x_days

field.label: Show On Frontend
field.description: If set to Yes, this plugin will be available on frontend add/edit plan form
